name: 5-Minute Radicchio and Watercress Salad
description: This quick and easy salad of hearty, peppery greens is the perfect side dish for a weeknight supper.
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces radicchio (about 1/2 medium head; 225g), cored, leaves torn into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss together radicchio, watercress or arugula, radishes, lemon juice, and olive oil. Season with salt. Serve immediately.
